channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Hackers spin a tedious yarn - fabric supplier behind H&M, Adidas, and more hit by worrying cyber breach
item.description: Fulgar suffers ransomware attack by RansomHouse, leaking financial and operational data to the dark web.

item.title: You need to listen to the searing noise pop album Forever in Your Heart
item.description: There's something irresistible about music that sounds as if it's coming apart at the seams. The Black Dresses are masters of barely contained chaos. All of their records feel as if they're in danger of collapsing into pure noise at any moment. But never have they so expertly woven the various threads of their sound […]

item.title: Beloved SF cat’s death fuels Waymo criticism
item.description: The death of a neighborhood bodega cat named Kit Kat has shaken San Francisco’s Mission District and prompted new debates about robotaxi safety.

item.title: Can top AI tools be bullied into malicious work? ChatGPT, Gemini, and more are put to the test, and the results are actually genuinely surprising
item.description: Adversarial testing of top AI models revealed vulnerabilities, showing some could be manipulated into unsafe responses despite safety measures.
